1.Title: Flowing Flame
1.Description: Upon launching a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Assist</color>, the equipper's Impact increases by <color=#2BAD00>25%</color> for 8s. When the equipper launches and hits an enemy with a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, apply <color=#FFFFFF>Wilt</color> to the target for 30s, stacking up to 20 times, repeated triggers reset the duration. When any squad member hits an enemy, for every stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Wilt</color> applied to the target, the CRIT DMG of the <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> dealt by that attack increases by <color=#2BAD00>1.5%</color>. Only one instance of this effect can exist in the same squad.
